seo.title: Web Design & Digital Strategy for Small Businesses UK | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: All-inclusive web design for UK small businesses: strategy, conversion-focused website, SEO copywriting, GA4 tracking and lead generation — from £1,495. No hidden costs, no DIY.

content.eyebrow: Metis Web Agency — Web Design for UK Small Businesses
content.title: Your website should generate leads — not just exist
content.subtitle: All-inclusive web design: strategy, copy, SEO & tracking — one price, no surprises.
content.body:
We build websites that actually work for UK small businesses. Strategy first, then a fast, clear site with professional copy, technical SEO and GA4 tracking built in.

Everything you need to turn visitors into enquiries — from £1,495.

content.title: Website + copy + SEO + tracking. All included.
content.subtitle: Most agencies charge extra for copywriting, SEO and analytics. We don't.
content.body: We're a remote-first agency working with SMEs across the UK. We combine strategy, web development, persuasive copy and clean tracking into one package — so you get a complete lead-generation system, not a collection of disconnected services.

header.eyebrow: How we help UK businesses grow
header.title:
One method
from strategy to measurable results
header.subtitle: A connected system — not random services.
header.body: Results come from a process: define direction, build conversion-ready pages, then drive qualified traffic and track outcomes. Here's how we do it.

items.title: Goals, audience & positioning
items.description: We define your target market, value proposition and messaging. Everything else flows from this — so nothing is wasted.

items.title: Websites & landing pages that convert
items.description: Fast, clear websites with professional copy, strong CTAs and GA4/GTM tracking. Built for enquiries, not just aesthetics.

items.title: SEO, Ads & performance tracking
items.description: We bring qualified traffic with SEO and Google/Meta Ads, then optimise using clean analytics — so decisions are driven by data.

content.title: Everything you need in one package, from £1,495
content.subtitle: No hidden costs. No DIY copywriting. No 'extras' you discover later.

columns.subtitle: What's included as standard
columns.description: Strategy & positioning — Professional SEO copy — Responsive website design — Mobile-first development — GA4 & GTM tracking setup — Technical SEO (metadata, sitemap, Core Web Vitals) — Contact forms & lead capture — 30-day post-launch support

columns.subtitle: What you'll never pay extra for
columns.description: Copywriting (we write it) — Basic on-page SEO — Analytics setup — SSL certificate — Performance optimisation — Responsive mobile design — Initial keyword research

header.title: Choose the package that fits your business
header.subtitle: Clear scope, GBP pricing, no hidden fees.
header.body: Every package includes strategy, copy, SEO and tracking. Pick the one that matches where you are today — or tell us your goal and we'll recommend the right path.

items.title: Starter — build your online presence
items.description:
Strategy, messaging, a conversion-ready website (up to 5 pages), professional copy, technical SEO and GA4 tracking.

Everything you need to launch and start generating enquiries.

items.title: Growth — fix and activate your website
items.description:
Website audit, message rewrite, CTA optimisation, GA4/GTM tracking and a lead-gen plan with SEO or Ads.

Turn your existing site into a lead machine.

items.title: E-commerce — built to sell
items.description:
Strategy, product structure, conversion-optimised e-commerce, payment/shipping setup, SEO and ongoing optimisation.

A shop that grows — not just a catalogue.

content.title: A clear process, built for lead generation
content.subtitle: Deliverables you can understand, results you can track.

columns.subtitle: 01 — Strategy before design
columns.description: We don't jump to pixels. We start with your goals, audience and message — so the website has direction from day one.

columns.subtitle: 02 — Copy & SEO included
columns.description: Professional, conversion-focused copy and on-page SEO are included in every package. You don't write a word — unless you want to.

columns.subtitle: 03 — Tracking from launch
columns.description: GA4/GTM events, conversion tracking and a simple dashboard — so you know what's working from the first week.
